definition: axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The stars appear to move in circles about a line through the poles of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 羣星看起來都在圍繞地球的極軸轉動。

sentences.english: A. shaft and integral 40mm guide scope.
sentences.chinese: 軸上安裝極軸鏡，內部有40mm的導星鏡。

sentences.english: The alignment of the polar axis and the monitoring of the guiding process require absolute accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 極軸的擺放及追蹤過程必須十分準確。

sentences.english: The alignment of the polar axis and the of the guiding process require absolute accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 極軸的擺放及追蹤過程必須十分準確。
